title: Nightclubs and large events advised to ask for vaccine passports
content:
1. Nightclubs and large events advised to ask for vaccine passports  BBC News
  2. Health secretary Sajid Javid confirms lifting of restrictions on 19 July  Guardian News
  3. England to lift COVID curbs next week but urges caution as cases surge  Yahoo News
  4. The NHS is already overstretched – dropping Covid restrictions will spell disaster for patients  The Guardian
  5. Covid: England lockdown rules to end on 19 July, PM confirms  BBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: ナイトクラブや大規模なイベントでは、ワクチンパスポートの提示を求められることがあります。
建议夜总会和大型活动要求提供疫苗护照
建議夜總會和大型活動要求提供疫苗護照
